Package org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockInventoryEvent
    Represents an InventoryEvent that involves a Block as a carrier.
    BrewEvent
    Fired when an item is brewed.
    BulkItemResultEvent
    Fired when some inventory event causes multiple resulting items.
    ContainerEvent
    An ContainerEvent is a GameEvent that involves a Container.
    ContainerOpenEvent
    Fired when a viewer opens an inventory.
    CraftItemEvent
    A CraftItemEvent is fired when an item is crafted from a player inventory or workbench inventory, or any other crafting inventory.
    InventoryClickEvent  
    InventoryCloseEvent
    Fired when a viewer closes an inventory.
    InventoryEvent
    An InventoryEvent is a GameEvent that involves an Inventory.
    ItemDropEvent
    Handles when any item or items are dropped on the ground.
    ItemEvent
    Called when an Item does something.
    ItemExpireEvent
    An event that represents when an item disappears from the world due to expiration.
    ItemExtractEvent  
    ItemMergeEvent
    Called when an Item is merged with another Item.
    ItemResultEvent
    Fired when some inventory event causes a single result item.
    ViewerEvent
    A ViewerEvent is an InventoryEvent that happens with a specific viewer in a transaction.
